PRODUCTS.title: SLEDGE HAMMER
PRODUCTS.description: A POWERFUL & HEAVY tool used in various applications, primarily for heavy-duty demolition, construction, and industrial tasks!

PRODUCTS.title: TAPE MEASURE
PRODUCTS.description: An AUTO-LOCKING tape measure, has the mechanism that AUTOMATICALLY locks the tape in place once you have extended it to the desired length!

PRODUCTS.title: HAND CHISEL
PRODUCTS.description: Most common used tool for CARRVING & SHAPING hard materials such as Wood, Stone, & Metal!

PRODUCTS.title: INSULATING TAPE
PRODUCTS.description: Commonly used for  INSULATING, PROTECTING, & BUNDLING electrical wires and components!

PRODUCTS.title: HACKSAW FRAME
PRODUCTS.description: Designed to be STURDY & DURABLE to handle HEAVY-DUTY cutting tasks on metal & other tough materials!

PRODUCTS.title: WATER PUMP
PRODUCTS.description: Suitable for a range of RESIDENTIAL, INDUSTRIAL, & AGRICULTURAL applications where reliable water pumping is necessary!

PRODUCTS.title: SANDFLEX BLADES
PRODUCTS.description: Are you tired of struggling with dull, unreliable hacksaw blades that slow you down on your projects? Look no further! This Hacksaw Blade is engineered to REVOLUTIONIZE your cutting experience

PRODUCTS.title: CUTTING DISCS
PRODUCTS.description: Commonly used in various industries & applications which require PRECISE cutting of hard materials, such as BRICK, STONE, MARBLE, TILES, & MASONRY!
